# Core runtime dependencies for federated-regressive-learning
numpy>=1.24
scipy>=1.10
pandas>=2.0
scikit-learn>=1.3
matplotlib>=3.7
tqdm>=4.66
PyYAML>=6.0
joblib>=1.3

# NOTE: Install PyTorch separately (platform-specific):
# CPU:    pip install torch torchvision torchaudio --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu
# CUDA12: pip install torch torchvision torchaudio --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu121
